headline: The Bull Case For Franklin Resources (BEN) Could Change Following Record Inflows And Blockchain Push – Learn Why
summary: In recent updates, Franklin Resources reported broad-based net inflows and record assets under management, while Franklin Templeton Canada announced past cash distributions for selected ETFs and ETF series payable in early March 2026. The firm is also advancing a tokenized collateral programme and wider blockchain initiatives, underlining its push to modernize operational processes in asset management. We’ll now examine how these record inflows and digital asset initiatives influence...
